name: Hidero Horibe's style
description:
My pixiv link：

https://www.pixiv.net/users/76094070

This is the style of a deceased famous artist whose name you may not have heard, but you certainly know a galgame called "Shuusaku".

I used his two books of paintings as Lora training material.

And this time I used two different parameters for training. Two models were created.

Here I call them 01 and 02

Here are their training parameters, by the images created, I prefer the style of 02, 01 feels more retro to me.

01:

batch_size = 2

network_dim = 128

network_alpha = 128

use_lion = 1

no noise offset

no loo

02:

batch_size = 1

network_dim = 16

network_alpha = 8

noise_offset = 0.1

enable_locon_train = 1

use_lion = 1

Here are some training diagrams, my Lora name is HH02EP20, "HH" is the abbreviation of this master's name, "02" is the second model, "EP20 " is Training Epochs: 20，If you would like additional training epochs, please leave a comment below.

01

02

Please don't use it for commercial purposes, I just miss the work of the master, and the acg culture of that era.
